message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
I understand you want a larger share, but a 60/40 split is too much. How about we meet closer to the middle? This offer ensures you still get a good deal.
I see you're willing to compromise, let's try to meet closer to my original offer
Alice, this back and forth is costing us money.  Let's stop wasting time and split it evenly. 50/50 is the fairest and fastest solution.
